string.desription: Error shown if user tries to change a pending invite to an owner of the folder
string.name: box_sharedsdk_new_owner_not_collaborator

string.description: Error shown if changing ownership fails for unknown reason
string.name: box_sharedsdk_unable_to_update_owner

resources.string: Impossibile aggiornare il proprietario. Contatta il supporto.

string.description: Error shown when api fetching collaborators fails due to unknown reasons
string.name: box_sharesdk_cannot_get_collaborators

resources.string: Impossibile recuperare i collaboratori. Se il problema persiste, contatta il supporto.
Impossibile invitare i collaboratori. Se il problema persiste, contatta il supporto.
